titleStmt.title: A new ballad, intituled, A warning to youth, shewing the lewd life of a marchants sonne of London, and the miserie that at the last he sustained by his riotousnesse. To the tune of the Lord Darley.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "In London dwelt a marchant man ..."
Place and date of publication suggested by STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
